ygData.messageBody:
> Aren't you supposed to charm your victim before you kill it to
clear it's exp history list? I thought this would ensure that you
got the exp.


That may work while soloing (I'm not sure as I don't charm kite), but
he was trying to show with his example that "allowing charm to break"
in a group setting would poof the mob you're fighting. In that
situation, it would be pretty difficult to try and recharm the mob
you're fighting (to clear it's damage list) while everyone's beating
on it.

As far as mana regen goes, without numbers to back it up, I'd trust
Kaeria's findings before I'd trust anyone else's. Kaeria's findings
show that NO mana regen works on Bards except sitting.

Darkfox
Xegony
